name: Root rebellion (Ghetto_Noodles)
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2023. The theme for the Jam was "Roots".

In Root Rebellion, players dash through enemies to defend their roots. players must prioritise which roots they defend as they will quickly get overwhelmed when trying to slice through all of the enemies. Controller is recommended.

As this is my first digital game, feedback would be much appreciated. Enjoy!
